column4: I'm trying to get seamless working, following this guide http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=433359&highlight=seamless+virtualbox but I still see the background.  Any ideas?
you are using XP, and you are using the Welcome screen and fast switch user settings right?
XP yes, the rest I don't know, I followed the guide, except for the start with Ubuntu stuff
well ok the first thing is get in the VXP machine and go to control panel user control, and click on Control way user's log in and out
you want it to have welcome screen clicked, and fast user switch clicked
hold on i'll screen shot it all for you
that I didn't see, one second
they are both checked, Welcome and Fast User
ok what part of all this is not working?
are you able to rdp into the xp machine?
I see the desktop background from the VXP, I thought it'd be seamless
I don't know what that is, so I'd assume it isn't
i'd assume it isn't either ;) .. ok what is the command you are using from ubuntu to connect, leave out user name and password
have you tried the remote execute command with single quotes?
yeah, it gives an error, so I'd think the quotes are needed
